snippet: Several missiles fired from American drones hit a compound near the Afghan border on Tuesday, killing at least eight people suspected of being militants, Pakistani officials said.
abstract: Pakistani officials say several missiles fired from American drones hit compound near Afghan border, killing at least eight people suspected of being militants.
lead_paragraph: Several missiles fired from American drones hit a compound near the Afghan border on Tuesday, killing at least eight people suspected of being militants, Pakistani officials said.

headline.seo: Pakistan: Drone Strike Kills 8 Militants, Officials Say
headline.main: Pakistan: Drone Strike Kills 8 Militants, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Drone Strike Kills 8 Militants, Officials Say
